mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, biz_no as bizNo, biz_name as bizName, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_level as memberLevel, member_gender as memberGender, member_birth as memberBirth, member_postcode as memberPostcode, member_addr1 as memberAddr1, member_addr2 as memberAddr3, member_point as memberPoint from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
